EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-02-20 Container Adoption.Thanks for joining us
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining {{my.Webinar Title:default=Our Webinar}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for joining our webinar on {{my.Webinar Title:default=The Webinar}}. You can watch the webinar on-demand here <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-container-adoption-wbn/]]>. We hope to see you for our next webinar on March 6th at 11 am ET, "AWS vs Azure". Register now to save your seat. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-vs-azure/]]>
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-vs-azure/]]>
Enjoy the recording! -Team Turbonomic
